website_summaries.verdict: A convenient roll-on product that you can apply right to your skin without diluting to reduce the severity of your headaches.
pros: Peppermint, lavender, and spearmint in a carrier oil
Can be applied directly to skin without irritating it
Significantly reduces the severity of headaches
cons: It's already diluted in a carrier oil, so it's not as powerful as pure essential oils would be

customer_reviews.title: Great company - pleasant smell - just doesn't work on my migraines
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, but does not relieve my headache. If your headaches are tension, the pleasing smell may help you relax, but mine are migraines and, so far, only medication works. Three stars because the sellers were very concerned that it did not work for me and wrote to give tips on how to use the product. Unfortunately, it still doesn't touch my vicious migraines, but that was very nice of them to follow up with me!
customer_reviews.author: Deals Girl

customer_reviews.title: Migraines go away with this marvelous product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little bottle has made a big difference in my life. I have chronic migraines. Medications work but leave me drowsy and listless. I've been using this full-on magic for a month or so. I put it on my neck, at the base of my skull and on my head, where the migraine pain is worst. Migraine goes away most of the time. When it doesn't go away completely, I just roll it on again. It really works for me. I also love the scent, not super sweet, but peppermint! Try it.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff for migraines!! Been using it for years!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this product, and the aromatherapy really helps to relieve the pain of my migraines and relax me. It doesn't make my migraines go away (I have bad hereditary migraines that usually require prescription medication to go away), but it certainly helps! I also use it for stress relief. Years have gone by, I've used several products for aromatherapy, but keep returning to this one. Love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Books123

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell like lavender, did not help headache
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to try and help headaches and love the smell of lavender. I personally don't think this smells like lavender. It has a strange scent that smells more like mint and something I can't identify. I find the smell off putting. Did a blind smell test with a friend and she also said it smelled minty but odd. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help my son with his headaches but I find that the product does not work as effectively as promised. Especially considering the fact that it's hard to get on him without a fight. It does smell fantastic though and it is very calming. The price is actually very reasonable as well the next time I actually get a headache I'll try to use it see if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A. Marandino

customer_reviews.title: The "Yang" to my Acupressure "Yin"
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great!! I don't use it alone, I use Aculief as well (link below), and the duo is a winner combo! Alone, they both only sort of work. I'm just happy I don't have to kill my insides with pain meds any more. Thanks, Nutravana!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had very good luck using the lavender for my headaches. I am not sure if it fights the migraine or the lavender helps me gp to sleep and then release the migraine...but it doesn’t matter since it works!!! I have bought 4 more bottles and sent them to family members who suffer with migraines too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works best in conjunction with OTC meds
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few migraines recently and I've tried it both as the first option to clear it up, and also in conjunction with other meds. While it didn't necessarily clear up a migraine on its own, it did help very much in conjunction with other meds. It does reduce the pain somewhat and the smell is very pleasant. Ultimately I ended up getting a chiropractic adjustment to totally get rid of the recurrance of the migraines, but will continue to use this product when I can. It's a nice size to carry in my purse or desk drawer at the first sign of one coming on.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Headache RELIEF..Found.:-).defintely thumbs Up!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time for buying the product...and I must say it definitely does the job it says it will do. I bought 2 of them and so pleased that I did, and the other one will be sent to my Grand-Daughter who suffers with Migraines all the time, and I do believe this product will help her also! Thanks Nutravana for producing something that does help with the Tension/Headaches..Just wish it was a larger bottle for the price.Sincerely, DMG
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Great combination of oils
customer_reviews.text: I like this little bottle of greatness. The combination of essential oils is perfect. They smell great and do take my headaches away. The only thing I'd change is to make the roller ball a bit bigger. It is a little painful when rolling on.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Costilla

customer_reviews.title: Good product easy to use and works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after a full evaluation of things for migraines I have extremely bad ones Medication does not work I’ve done injections ect you name it I’ve tried it but I tried this on a whim. The day this came in the mail I was feeling a migraine come on and I applied this within ten mins I was better than I’ve been in a long time I even let my daughter use this to help calm down. I normally will not touch a review but this product is a life saver. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: KATELIN FINNEGIN

customer_reviews.title: May cause break-outs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to replace the "Headache Relief" roll-on I purchased from Bath & Body Works probably a decade ago. It has since been discontinued, so I was looking for a suitable replacement. Although this has the desired scent combination, putting the oil on my temples (as I did with the roll-on) caused me to break out. I still have it, but I only use it for a really bad headache. Not nearly as much as I used the previous roll-on formula I fell in love with.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline P.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't a miracle worker for me, but might work for you!
customer_reviews.text: It's refreshing and I like the tingly feeling, but it doesn't seem to last long. If I use it, I feel relief, but about an hour later the headache comes back full force. I will say, I've had migraines and chronic headaches for about 15 years. I was looking for a miracle... Something that would keep me from taking so many pills. I feel like this product may work best on those who don't experience frequent strong migraines/headaches. It's worth a shot for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cora Bennett

customer_reviews.title: It has a great scent, very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This works well for relieving tension head aches. As for Migraines, don't know. Haven't had one since I purchased this. It may not make a migraine go away, but I think it will be very helpful.. It has a great scent, very relaxing. calming. You might even use it on a tissue or handkerchief and just sniff if for relaxing help They do advise on the best way to get relief and I very much appreciated the info.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: ... in a couple of minutes and the smell was good too. It came to the house in a ...
customer_reviews.text: This helped me with my headach i just rolled ( it comes in a roll on bottle which is grat no mess) on my temples and wristes and it was gone in a couple of minutes and the smell was good too. It came to the house in a couple of days not weeks and the company emailed me to make sure i recieved it THE BOTTLE LEAKS
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had really bad migraines and no medication would help. Ordered this hoping it would help and it did! I have used it when i feel one coming on and it worked within a few minutes taking all the pain away and when i had a bad migraine i used it and it took the edge off so i could at least function. I Definitely recommend trying this if you have migraines.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Get this now!
customer_reviews.text: This works! Get several bottles. It has a nice roller ball applicator so no mess. I have had chronic migraines for well over 30 years and frequent headaches with really no remedy for stopping them. I have taken numerous prescribed medications and no relief; until this. Try it you will be surprised. Inhale the aroma as it helps to calm as well. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stone

customer_reviews.title: This really works
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about this actually 'working', was pleasantly surprised when my headache disappeared after just a few minutes of applying this to my forehead and base of my skull. I was suffering headaches from a viral infection and this was just what I needed to take care of it. This is a great, more healthy alternative to using NSAIDs
customer_reviews.author: judyb

customer_reviews.title: Last for years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over 5 years ago, and I use it pretty often, and I still have over half a bottle left. It's still fresh and effective. It helps with my headaches and is great to rub on the back of your neck for tension. This is more than worth the cost of it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty jagessar

customer_reviews.title: I have found this product VERY HELPFUL!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: I have found this product VERY HELPFUL!!!! I have not responded before because I thought you preferred input from YOUR PRODUCT in isolation? I get Botox for Migrains = triggered by schingles (from back of head from neck up to under my eye on the left side) I also get a nerve block every couple of weeks for over all headaches. So I use your product, pain patches, etc.more as a 'supplement' and searching for ANYTHING that will sooth and/or give any relief... Many thanks for your efforts on our behalf... Joan Campbell
customer_reviews.author: Joan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I get chronic headaches and have been wanting an oil to help with that. This doesn't take my headaches away, but it is great help in addition to medication and chiropractic care. I roll it on my temples and back of my neck in the mornings, and I take a few deep sniffs of the great scent. I really think it helps take the edge off. A little goes a very long way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May work if you suffer from tension headaches
customer_reviews.text: This actually works much better than I or most people would think. I've had chronic tension headaches from years, and while they're greatly reduced now with a combination of medication and lifestyle adjustments, I have found that this formula is soothing, and if I catch a headache just as its starting, this helps soothe the pain away. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with Results
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with how well it works to relieve headaches. If you put it on as soon as you feel one coming on, it goes away before it starts.

customer_reviews.title: Best headache relief
customer_reviews.text: Does an amazing job of relaxing you and helpful with headache. I have had colleagues borrow it during our stressful times and everyone has positive feedback on it. Thank you for creating this product.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!  So happy I ordered it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything, for my chronic headaches!!!! I thought, what do I have to lose?? So, I ordered a bottle of Nutravana. I have to admit it, it really works!!! I went from having a throbbing, blurry vision, sick at my stomach headache, to a dull throb, and clear vision and no nausea!!! I will keep a bottle on me, at all times!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I have used it. I'm on an ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I have used it. I'm on an injection to shrink a cancerous tumor and one of the side effects is a headache. I apply it to the back of my head (right side about 2 inches behind my ear) when I feel the ache coming on. It does work and the ache and pressure seem to disappear. Thanks, Bruce
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Little miracle worker!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked amazing for me with my daily headaches! As soon as I feel one beginning I roll some of the oil on my temples, wrists, neck, and my hairline and it starts to go away! Now it does not work for my migraines so I am still having to take Excedrine for that but this little miracle worker has greatly decreased my pain medication intake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I suffer greatly with headaches so I am up for ...
customer_reviews.text: I suffer greatly with headaches so I am up for trying about anything to get some relief. I tried this on a whim and imagine my surprise when it has actually helped! It helps relieve the pain so I can at least relax and rest. It has really worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy W.

customer_reviews.title: By no means does it stop it in its tracks once you have one but its good for prevention and good for getting you back to ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps with everyday stress and helps me relax when I do get a headache or migraine. By no means does it stop it in its tracks once you have one but its good for prevention and good for getting you back to your day faster. Great product to have and at a great price. The bottle is large enough that it will last awhile. I roll it on my temples, at the base of my skull, behind my ears, above my upper lip and my inner wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Viehweg

customer_reviews.title: TRY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Just a few drops on my wrists and temples, and my headache gets better! I've been reading about natural remedies for years, and this really does work. TRY it, especially if you're plagued with headaches.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product ACTUALLY works. After i used this and was amazed that it really does work I bought it for friends and family that suffer from tension and/or headaches. They all are thrilled with the headache and tension relief they receive. WE will continue to use this product and tell everyone we know how great it is!!!

customer_reviews.title: High hopes - Big let down!
customer_reviews.text: The 1st problem I encountered is barely any oil comes out of the roller. What does come out has a very weak aroma. It disappears in seconds. I also expected some kind of cooling effect on my skin and I did not experience that. I purchased this oil on the strength of the reviews hoping for some relief from chronic daily migraines, but i feel as though i've just thrown away my money. I wish I had positive things to say but I DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jenni thomas

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE HEADACHES
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 4/9/14. My allergies were the worst ever. I tried everything OTC and decided Holistic would be one more try. This product works for my severe headaches. I would recommend anyone with a headache problem to just try it.

customer_reviews.title: I like this product

I have been using other migraine remedies along with the oil, but I have noticed that the oil does help my sinuses when I use it. I enjoy it very much and will be purchasing more when this runs out.

customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of the Headache Relief formula. It is very calming... and the breathing and tension release exercise suggestions are wonderful. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: pdek

customer_reviews.title: Oils are not potent/strong enough (compared to migrastick or others) ...
customer_reviews.text: Oils are not potent/strong enough (compared to migrastick or others), so there was no relief from my headache. It's a bit disappointing, since the price is twice as much as the migrastick.
customer_reviews.author: Yael

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about how good this product would be till i used it! It is perfect... I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: I loved the oil
customer_reviews.text: I loved the oil, it helped me a lot! Thanks again, will be buying more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Karine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work the only good thing about it is the smell
customer_reviews.author: 3D-Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This provides some temporary relief from head pain, but not much.
customer_reviews.author: EGould

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!!
customer_reviews.text: I currently suffer from chronic migraines daily. This product doesn't even work for the pain that I experience. Guess I'll go back to the basic peppermint sticks that I've used before.
customer_reviews.author: kathy bolin

customer_reviews.title: Very worthwhile product for headache sufferer
customer_reviews.text: It took me a couple weeks to order this after reading about it. Then, I looked forward to trying it. I am not disappointed. It does not CURE my headaches. What it does is HELP! Without drugs. And, that i LOVE. I have had migraines and sinus headaches longer than I care to remember. I highly recommend and encourage this product. It is a "tool" in a headache sufferer's toolbag. There are NO side effects and nothing harmful. I am now getting ready to order and try the stress relief formula. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: tlkamy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a typical headache
customer_reviews.text: I have been plagued with headaches for most of my life and this does a great job on my less than severe ones. Even on my worst headaches this will take the edge off and assist if I need to take something stronger. Also the scent does help me relax. I have purchased this for my daughters and they also use it. Also I dealt with the company a couple years ago when I received one that was clearly opened. I contacted them and not only did they replace it, they also sent a bottle of their Stress Relief which sits by my computer for heavy stress days.
customer_reviews.author: loulblades

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality from an Outstanding Company
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! The scents are so relaxing, we now use them nightly. Even my 9 year old daughter loves them! The bottle for our original order leaked. It was no big deal (we could still use it) but we responded to an email sent by Nutravana just to give them a feedback on the leak. A few days later, we received a replacement with a hand written note! Not only is the quality of this product exceptional, but the quick personalized response has made us loyal Nutravana customers !
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: This is beautifully packaged for use
customer_reviews.text: This is beautifully packaged for use. It has a rollerball tip and glides on to where you want it. It has a soothing fragrance and this helps to calm my stomach which tends to be upset when I have a headache. I keep it near me at all times, taking it in my purse when I go out. It is so easy and discreet to use. It doesn't eliminate my headache, but it really does make it more bearable and of shorter duration. Give it a try. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: avid listener

customer_reviews.title: really like the roller
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a variety of these headache oils trying to find something that works as well as one I borrowed years ago. This works about as well as any I've tried... It completely knocks the headache out about half the time. I really love this one for the size and shape of the roller applicator. It's perfect for massaging with firmer pressure than I can do on the back of my own neck, especially at the base of the skull. I also rub it into my tmj and put a dot under my nose so I can keep smelling it. You may want to test if it irritates your skin before putting on your face.
customer_reviews.author: CEK

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've now bought my third bottle of Headache Relief (two for me and one for a friend). I've kept one at work and realized it would be good to have one at home, too. I get lots of headaches and enjoy the feel when I roll it on my neck and the fragrance feels so calming, too. Thanks for a wonderful product! Oh, and my friend liked it so much she bought one for her grandson! I appreciate all your suggestions on how to use it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Ann Bauerlein

product_meta.title: Headache Relief for Migraine, Tension, Sinus Headaches Pressure Calm Stress 15ml Nutravana All Natural Kids Safe Aromatherapy Pure Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils Peppermint Lavender Blend Roll-on
product_meta.description:
A Few Drops Is All It Took to soothe the pain and calm the throbbing with no pills. The worst of the headache is gone! Life can return!

Do you or your family suffer from headaches, migraines, stress, tension, sinus pressure, irritated sinuses or sensitive nerves?

Headache pills risk your heart, liver, stomach and kidney health!

Here is your 'First Line of Defense' ready to use

’Headache Relief’ is not a medication or a cure, but it can support soothing and relaxing which can save your day. When applied early, users many times find their headaches able to resolve themselves or other issues are tamed requiring less or no risky pills, tablets or medicine.

That’s why this aromatherapy remedy has been a Best Seller at our Aroma Workshop in Chicago for over 20 years!

The convenient small glass bottle has a removable rollerball and cap that prevent leaking in a purse or bag. Each bottle contains over 200 treatments so it will be around soothing you for months at pennies per use.

Safe for kids over 2. You'll love the soothing aroma. Due to peppermint, pregnant mothers or lactating women should consult a doctor before use.

ISO 9001-2008 Lab Tested

Sourced directly from ethical producers, our Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils are tested for purity, high potency, authenticity; Certified Vegan, Kosher, Fair-trade, No Animal Testing; No chemicals, pesticides or artificial ingredients added.

Peppermint menthol supports cooling your skin. Its thousands of years of medicinal use includes soothing headaches, migraines and stomach related upsets.

Lavender has been known for ages to relieve discomfort and relax its users.

Spearmint is historically used to treat queasy stomachs.

90 Day Money Back Guarantee

If you are not satisfied for any reason, return it, even empty, for a prompt and courteous full refund. No questions asked. You'll be completely satisfied or your money back.
feature_bullets: WE ALL WANT TO TAKE FEWER PILLS. RIGHT? The FDA, Doctors Warn of Pill's Serious Threat to Heart, Liver, Stomach, Kidneys
SAFELY CREATE YOUR "FIRST LINE of DEFENSE" with our highly praised Headaches Remedy Formula by renowned Chicago Aromatherapist, Tedd Neenan

Other Peppermint, Spearmint essential oils may cause burning and skin irritation unless properly pre-diluted. Our rollerball remedies are safe for topical use. Certified Vegan, Kosher and Cruelty-free
SHOW YOU CARE For Family Or Friends Who Suffer. They'll love the mild minty scent; not overpowering for sensitive stomachs. The non-greasy antioxidant skin conditioning oils absorb readily, stainfree
TRY IT NOW RISK-FREE 100% Guaranteed for 365 days. Return, even empty, for any reason for full money back. Click 'Add to Cart' to get started now
